summary: Fixed two bugs: 1) PaymobController JSON validation - Added proper JSON error checking using json_last_error() to validate JSON before use, preventing issues with malformed configuration data. 2) BusinessSettingsController notification module type - Added beauty module check so beauty notifications use beauty module_type instead of falling through to all.
current_status: Both bugs verified and fixed. PaymobController now validates JSON properly and logs errors. BusinessSettingsController correctly handles beauty module notification settings.
